about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A Somali software student and developer, advancing in the technology world with a self-taught approach.

story.title: My Story
story.p1: I'm Mowlid Abdinor Abdullahi, a software developer specializing in building modern web and mobile applications. While pursuing my degree in Information Systems and Technologies at Mehmet Akif Ersoy University in Turkey, I've focused on delivering real-world solutions that help businesses grow.
story.p2: My portfolio includes a professional website for a local café, an online shopping application for a butcher shop, and Smart Save—a personal finance app designed for expense management. Each project reflects my commitment to clean, user-focused design and reliable functionality.
story.p3: I partner with businesses and startups to create software that works—modern, scalable, and built to last. My goal is to grow a software company that delivers trustworthy digital solutions, helping clients thrive in an increasingly connected world.

student.title: Student Period
student.description: I started my self-learning journey. I started by learning the basics of web development and continue to improve myself constantly in this process.

projects.title: First Projects
projects.description: I started developing my first projects by putting what I learned into practice. I gained experience with websites, small applications and open source contributions.

company.title: Company Establishment
company.description: I started establishing my own software company and transforming what I learned into professional services. I aim to add value to clients with modern technologies.

vision.title: Global Vision
vision.description: My long-term goal is to establish a global software company and serve clients worldwide. I want to contribute to the digital transformation of businesses with modern technologies.
